TraitDef.label: Khajiit Natural Agility
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit possesses the natural agility and stealth of their feline heritage, along with keen night vision and nimble fingers.

li.label: Feline Grace
li.description: Born with the natural agility of the cat-folk, this pawn excels in stealth, movement, and fine manipulation.

TraitDef.label: Argonian Adaptation
TraitDef.description: This Argonian possesses the natural adaptations of the lizard-folk, including resistance to disease and superior swimming abilities.

li.label: Hist-Born
li.description: Born under the blessing of the Hist, this pawn has enhanced resistance to disease and natural healing abilities.

TraitDef.label: Breton Magic Resistance
TraitDef.description: This Breton possesses the natural magic resistance and intellect of their mixed elven-human heritage.

li.label: Dragonskin
li.description: Born with natural magic resistance and enhanced intellect from their mixed heritage.

TraitDef.label: Nord Resilience
TraitDef.description: This Nord possesses the natural hardiness and combat prowess of the northern warriors of Skyrim.

li.label: Nordic Steel
li.description: Born in the harsh lands of Skyrim, this pawn has enhanced cold resistance and natural combat abilities.

TraitDef.label: Redguard Warrior Spirit
TraitDef.description: This Redguard possesses the natural warrior traditions and desert adaptations of Hammerfell.

li.label: Sword-Singer
li.description: Born with the warrior traditions of Hammerfell, this pawn excels in combat and desert survival.

TraitDef.label: Imperial Diplomacy
TraitDef.description: This Imperial possesses the natural leadership and diplomatic skills that built the Empire.

li.label: Voice of the Emperor
li.description: Born with the diplomatic traditions of Cyrodiil, this pawn excels in social situations and leadership.

TraitDef.label: Lilmothiit Cunning
TraitDef.description: This Lilmothiit possesses the natural cunning and trade skills of the fox-people of Black Marsh.

li.label: Fox Cunning
li.description: Born with the intelligence and agility of the fox-folk, this pawn excels in social situations, trade, and stealth.

TraitDef.label: Sload Necromancy
TraitDef.description: This Sload possesses the ancient necromantic knowledge and disease mastery of the slug-lords of Thras.

li.label: Master of Disease
li.description: Born with ancient necromantic powers, this pawn has exceptional magical knowledge but moves very slowly.

TraitDef.label: Ka Po' Tun Honor
TraitDef.description: This Ka Po' Tun possesses the warrior honor and discipline of the tiger-people of Akavir.

li.label: Dragon Disciple
li.description: Born with the strength and honor of the tiger-folk, this pawn excels in combat and shows unwavering discipline.

TraitDef.label: Tang Mo Agility
TraitDef.description: This Tang Mo possesses the natural agility and crafting skills of the monkey-people of Akavir.

li.label: Simian Dexterity
li.description: Born with exceptional agility and intelligence, this pawn excels in crafting, movement, and intellectual pursuits.

TraitDef.label: Tsaesci Vampirism
TraitDef.description: This Tsaesci possesses the vampiric abilities and combat prowess of the serpent-people of Akavir.

li.label: Serpent Vampire
li.description: Born with vampiric serpent nature, this pawn has enhanced combat abilities and unnatural longevity.

TraitDef.label: Lamia Enchantment
TraitDef.description: This Lamia possesses the magical enchantment abilities and serpentine nature of the snake-centaurs.

li.label: Serpent Enchantress
li.description: Born with enchanting magic and serpentine grace, this pawn excels in magic and social manipulation.

TraitDef.label: Imga Sophistication
TraitDef.description: This Imga possesses the cultured sophistication and Altmer-worshipping nature of the intelligent ape-folk.

li.label: Cultured Ape
li.description: Born with sophisticated culture and Altmer worship, this pawn excels in social and artistic pursuits while maintaining physical strength.
